auteur: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "auteur" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY)
lien: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "lien" ("URL" TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "chanName" TEXT, "langue" TEXT, "authid" INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY ("authid") REFERENCES auteur(id))
tag: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "tag" ("value" TEXT, "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "description" TEXT, "authid" INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY ("authid") REFERENCES auteur(id))
tagmap: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "tagmap" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "lien_id" INTEGER, "tag_id" INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY ("lien_id") REFERENCES lien(id), FOREIGN KEY ("tag_id") REFERENCES tag(id))
event: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "event" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, "url" TEXT, "begin_date" TEXT, "end_date" TEXT, "authid" INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY ("authid") REFERENCES auteur(id), FOREIGN KEY ("url") REFERENCES lien(URL))
synonyme: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "synonyme" ("authID" INTEGER, "old" TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "new" TEXT, FOREIGN KEY ("authid") REFERENCES auteur(id))
